# Power Plus Heating Ltd
> gas engineers in Birmingham

## About
Power Plus Heating Ltd is an independent Gas Safe registered heating engineer serving Birmingham and the West Midlands. Run by Saboor Khan, the business has earned 336 five-star reviews through personal service, professional workmanship, and honest advice. Unlike larger companies with call centres, customers speak directly to Saboor from initial quote through to job completion.

## Contact
- Phone: 07305 928834
- Area: Birmingham and surrounding areas
- Website listed on [TradeHub](https://tradehub.directory/trades/power-plus-heating-ltd)

## Services
- Boiler Replacement
- Boiler Servicing
- Boiler Repairs
- Gas Safety Certificates
- Central Heating
- Radiator Installation
- Thermostat Fitting
- Emergency Callouts
